text: Selena On Going To Rehab For Psychiatric Treatment : “ You have no idea how incredible it felt to just be with six girls, real people who couldn ’ t give two s * * ts about who I was, who were fighting for their lives. It was one of the hardest things I ’ ve done, but it was the best thing I ’ ve done. ” Selena On Dialectical Behavior Therapy : “ DBT has completely changed my life. I wish more people would talk about therapy. We girls, we ’ re taught to be almost too resilient, to be strong and sexy and cool and laid - back, the girl who ’ s down.
